content.rendered:
Directed by Hari. P.H. Kumanan.

Written by Hari.

Cast Suriya(Durai Singam). Anushka Shetty(Kavya). Shruti Haasan(Vidya / Agni). Thakur Anoop Singh(Vitthal Prasad) .Imman Annachi. Sarath Babu(Minister).Chaams. Nitu Chandra(Special Appearance in song (as Neetu Chandra)). Janaki Ganesh(Kavya’s Mother). Olamilekan Akanbi Jason(Jason). V. Jayaprakash(Commissioner). Krish(Srinivas).Delhi Kumar. Nassar(Kavya’s Father (as Nasser)).Priya. Radha Ravi(Durai Singam’s Father). Andrea Marian Renji(Commissioner’s Daughter).Radhika Sarathkumar.Nitin Sathya. Sharat Saxena(Madhusudhana Reddy). Saran Shakthi(Tea shop boy). Robo Shankar(Subba Rao).Soori. Suman(Vitthal Prasad’s Father).Sumithra. Vijayakumar(TN Home Minister (as Vijay Kumar)).Yuvarani

Languages Tamil. Telugu.

Producers Dhaval Gada. K.E. Gnanavelraja. Sanjay Singh. Jithin Thorai.

Production Aadnah Arts. Pen Movies. Studio Green.
